grant_camera_access.title: Grant Camera Access
grant_camera_access.description: To scan QR and Barcodes, we need access to your camera.
grant_camera_access.disclaimer: You can disable this at any time in the system settings.

error.title: Access denied
error.description: Looks like you have denied camera access. Please go to the system settings and grant camera access.

delete_card_message: Are you sure you want to delete your '{name}' card? This action cannot be undone.
